Text:
And now, a toast. To the continued prosperity of
Golden Village... Cheers!
Cheers!
Come, travelers, drink up. Don't be shy.
Sniff, sniff...this alcohol smells pretty strong.
Hm? You can tell? Oh dear...
I don't hold my liquor well, but thanks for the offer.

(Well, that was a lie. I just don't know what could
be in my drink. I can't trust this village...)

(They seem used to having tourists, but they can't
show them the golden fruit.)

(Even though they're wealthy, none of the adults are
smiling for real. There's something going on. It's
obvious...)

Aw, that's too bad. But don't worry, we've got lots
of food!
Ooh, does this village have a specialty dish?
Well, of course...it's golden soup!

That sounds like it has something to do with the
golden fruit.

Correct. We pick the golden fruit and make a sauce
out of its juice and use it in the soup.

It's a special dish, though. Usually only the village
chief or government officials get to eat it.
But you let tourists eat it?

Yes! Aw, you're so lucky. I've never had a chance to
eat it.
I'd love to try it someday, too... Here. This is it.

(They gave me a white porcelain dish with fancy
designs...with golden soup in it.)

(This dish is quite valuable. A product befitting of
a village called the "Golden Village"...)

(The soup is slightly steamy. It smells like tangy
fruit... hmm...)

Oh, I'm sorry, but I can't eat hot things. I'm a cat
therianthrope, you see.

Oh don't worry, it'll cool down right away! Would you
like me to blow on it for you?

N-No, thanks, I'd feel bad being given the VIP
treatment...

(Especially if the VIP treatment includes blowing on
my food... Yeah, they're definitely trying to make me
eat.)

Besides, it's hard to eat when you all are staring
at me.

Well, we're envious of anyone who gets to eat the
golden soup. Ohoho...
Okay, then...wanna eat it for me?
Huh?!
I'll let you have my portion, honey.
B-But...there's a rule in our village, you see...

It sounds like you're saying there is a reason not
to eat it. Am I right?
What?!

Traveler, that was an awfully rude thing to say. How
dare you badmouth our golden soup....

But as the village chief, you can eat it, right?
Wanna try it? Go ahead. Eat the soup that was
prepared for me.

Let me be frank. I know that this village's wealth
does not come from golden fruit.

You kill tourists and rob them... You're a den of
thieves.
How dare you! What proof do you have?!

Well, the golden fruit is probably poisonous. And if
you use its poison...
In a way, it is the golden fruit that makes you rich.

Traveler, if you're going to keep accusing us with
circumstantial evidence, we will have to retaliate.

Retaliate, eh? Well, in either case, somebody's dying
today. That explains why Kay's daddy yelled at me.
Said I should leave this village.

This village isn't at all welcoming to tourists. You see
us as animals caught in your traps, nothing more.
Urg!

Besides, my evidence is not circumstantial. I've got
proper proof, which I'll show you.
You have proof? But how...

Oop...sie daisy. This is a special kind of paper
a friend of mine invented.

It's purple right now, as you can see. But if it
touches poison, it changes color...
Th-That paper...it's just garbage!
Okay, let's slip it into this golden soup. Whee!
Ooh, it turned red! That means it's poison!
Urk...bogus paper! Everyone, get her!
Oh dear, the masks have come off, eh?

How could a stupid girl discover our village
secret...we can't let you leave this place alive.

Ohhh dear. So you confessed to it. I can't believe
you fell for the oldest trick in the book.
Y-You tricked us?!

See, the thing about poison is, there's so many
different types, they're hard to tell apart. If a
 single slip of paper could tell me everything,
my job would be much easier.

This paper turns red if it touches any liquid. I just
baited you, that's all.

You're right—this paper is bogus. I couldn't tell
that the soup was poisoned from it.

So we fell, hook line and sinker... You really are
a fool. I didn't want to have to kill the person who
saved my son's life.

Right back at ya, pal. I don't wanna kill the father
of the boy I saved.

Don't be silly, we completely outnumber you... Your
life ends now.

Aw, man, you can't tell the sheer difference in
aptitude between us, can you?

I'll just have to teach you...I'm in a whole other
league.
